<script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.4.2/jquery.min.js"></script>

		<script type = "text/javascript">
			$.getScript('http://tipped.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/jquery.tipped-latest.js',function(){
				$.getScript('http://tipped.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/code/javascript/SyntaxHighlighter/shCore.min.js',function(){
					$.getScript('http://tipped.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/code/javascript/SyntaxHighlighter/shBrushJScript.js',function(){
						$.getScript('http://tipped.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/code/javascript/SyntaxHighlighter/shBrushPhp.js',function(){
							$.getScript('http://tipped.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/code/javascript/SyntaxHighlighter/shBrushXml.js',function(){
								
								/* code highlight */
								SyntaxHighlighter.defaults['toolbar'] = false;
								SyntaxHighlighter.highlight();
								
								/* Tooltips */
								$("img[alt=tipped-title-hover]").tipped();
								$("img[alt=tipped-string-hover]").tipped({
									source:'This is another string'
								});
								$("img[alt=tipped-function-hover]").tipped({
									source:function($trigger){
										var $allIcons = $("img[src$='fruit.png']");
										var index = $allIcons.index($trigger)+1
										
										return "This is icon #"+index+" of "+$allIcons.length;
									}
								});
								$("img[alt=tipped-ajax-hover]").tipped({
									source:'url',
									throbber:'http://tipped.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/code/images/throbber.gif',
                                    url:'http://www.gstatic.com/codesite/ph/images/defaultlogo.png'
								});
								$("img[alt=tipped-string-hover]").tipped({
									mode:'click',
									params:function($trigger){
										var $allIcons = $trigger.parent().children('img');
										var index = $allIcons.index($trigger)+1 
										return {current:index,all:$allIcons.length};
									},
									source:'url',
									throbber:'http://tipped.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/code/images/throbber.gif',
                                    url:'http://www.gstatic.com/codesite/ph/images/defaultlogo.png'
								});
							});
						});
					});
				});
			});
	   </script>
